title: Kylie Jenner's make-up routine takes her 'no longer than 10 minutes'
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has shared that she takes "no longer than 10 minutes" to apply cosmetics to her face.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 22, who launched her Kylie Cosmetics brand in 2015, told that she has had to shorten the amount of time she takes on her visage as a result of being a mum.

Sharing her routine with her fans, the curvy star revealed her make-up details on her YouTube channel.

Unveiling her reason for the new video, the businesswoman, who shares her 21-month-old daughter with former flame Travis Scott, said: "I am always learning new things so my make-up routine is definitely changing.

The star added: "Also since becoming a mum, it has gone from taking me thirty minutes to do my make-up to now having to do my make-up in ten minutes."

(Image: Instagram)

During the eighteen minute tutorial, Kylie also revealed how she uses her make-up time to relax.

She said: "My favourite part about doing my makeup is, it's like a therapeutic moment for me. I turn my music on, if I'm gonna get ready at night I'll have a glass of wine. Or, I'll have my coffee if I'm doing it in the morning.''

It comes after Kylie and Travis are reportedly back living together following their recent split.

The parents i have been spending time together again as Travis, 28, moved back into Kylie's home in Calabasas.

The rapper dislocated his knee after falling on stage, and Kylie is allegedly helping him to recover.

A source told TMZ that when Travis isn't at that house, he's at the house they shared together in Beverly Hills.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: DPA/PA Images)

The source added that the pair are maintaining a friendship as they co parent their daughter, and will be spending even more time together as the festive season begins.

The source also told TMZ they intend to celebrate Thanksgiving and Christmas together as a family, and to keep the whole family united at other events and parties.

They also revealed Kylie and Travis' friends think they will get back together by the end of the year.
description: The make-up mogul claims she has cut her beauty routine down from half an hour to ten minutes after becoming a mum
